skins.selfIntroduction: I am the glorious Akagi, the pride of the peerless First Carrier Division. With my famed air wing, I shall overcome any battle as long as you are with me. Yes, Commander, as long as we are together...
skins.acquisition: We finally meet, Commander. However, there appear be too many eyesores here. Please allow me to "clean up" a bit before we deepen our relationship. Hehehe~
skins.login: Ah, welcome back... Commander, if you had taken any more of your sweet time, I would have turned this place into a sea of fire~
skins.details: Commander, are you keeping Akagi in your most secret of thoughts? Mmm, how delightful~.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you°Øre so cute when you are hard at work. Just watching you makes me feel like I°Øll overheat~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Don°Øt make fun of me for being slow-footed. See? I°Øve~ caught~ you~
skins.secretaryIdle3: You smell like... that girl! Commander, Akagi needs to step out for a bit~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you so desire, I would not mind if you partake of me in front of all the others.

skins.shipDescription: We should send out even more invites... This is the best way to rid ourselves of those pesky vixens all at once!
skins.acquisition: We should send out even more invites... This is the best way to rid ourselves of those pesky vixens all at once!
skins.login: Commander, why do you smell like another woman? Oh, so it was her? Hehe... Akagi understands!
skins.details: Commander, we must be together at all times.You definitely cannot leave my side~
skins.secretaryIdle1: It would be great if Commander and Akagi were the only people left in the world~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, stop struggling. Akagi made this special chain, just for you~
skins.secretaryIdle3: It°Øs human nature to want to possess something so special to you, Commander~ Ahaha~
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you hungry, Commander? Akagi is going to cook now. Don°Øt even try to run away~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you can°Øt resist any longer, right? Akagi feels the same way~

skins.shipDescription: "When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you". Commander, please do not forget that when you gaze at Akagi~ *giggles*
skins.acquisition: "When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you." Commander, please do not forget that when you gaze at Akagi~ *giggles*
skins.login: Ahh... Welcome back, my dear Commander. I wonder where you've been. Take your clothes off so I may know if the smell of vixens lingers on you~
skins.details: Akagi picked this swimsuit out just for you, Commander~! Are you falling in love with me even more deeply?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, it's dangerous to be separated at sea. Please hold my hand tightly~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Relax, Kaga. You're my only friend. You'll always have a place by my side.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wait until tonight, Commander. Kaga and I shall use our planes to hold a most spectacular fireworks show for you!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, what were you doing with that "Rodney" girl?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, won't you come teach me how to swim? Oh? What did you just say~?

skins.shipDescription: Commander will always remain by Akagi's side... Right, "Gods?" Of course... Akagi will deal with the pests.... Ahaha...
skins.acquisition: Commander will always remain by Akagi's side... Right, "Gods?" Of course... Akagi will deal with the pests.... Ahaha...
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Would you like to have dinner, a bath or... ahh, forget about that and eat me up first~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, we'll always be together, this year as well~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I've finished this batch of paperwork. Is there anything else you'd like me to attend to? Of course, if you're tired, please tell me~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you just spoke with that girl, didn't you? Just an "ordinary greeting?" Akagi understands... but if you get even an inch more "ordinary" with her, Akagi can't guarantee what will happen... Ahaha...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahaha... Akagi is always ready and willing~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, I've been waiting for you~ What a sinful one you are, to tempt Akagi like this for so long... But at long last, nobody will ever get between us again...?
skins.acquisition: Commander, I've been waiting for you~ What a sinful one you are, to tempt Akagi like this for so long... But at long last, nobody will ever get between us again...?
skins.login: Have you awoken, Commander? Akagi will always be at your side~
skins.details: Commander, I knew you'd be busy at the party, so I waited until the very end for you. Now, your full and undivided attention shall belong to Akagi alone~ Hehe~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I will not do anything that would tarnish your reputation, but... if any meddlesome pests insisted on getting in your way... Ehehe...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Indeed. While you were socializing, I made sure to strengthen our bonds with the other factions. At events like these, Shinano is horribly out of place, and if I may say so, the burden may be a bit too great for Nagato.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, why won't you get drunk with me already... Haah, even though Akagi has been so lonely for so long...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, there's a vacant seat right next to me~ Wouldn't you like to come a bit closer~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: It's just the two of us here... Yes, Commander, feel free to do whatever your heart so desires~
